content: **drops crochet cardigan in snow** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **size** s m l xl xxl **materials** drops snow from garnstudio 850-900-1000-1100-1200 g colour no 45 army 50-50-100-100-100 g colour no 40 brown mix drops crochet hook no 9 / us m/n - or the size needed to obtain the correct crochet gauge drops buffalo horn button nr 536 5-5-6-6-6 pcs
